# Getting Started with Venice AI

Welcome to Venice AI! This guide will help you get started with our API.

<Note>
This is an important note about the API.
</Note>

<Steps>
<Step title="Get your API key">
Sign up and get your API key from the dashboard.
</Step>

<Step title="Make your first request">
Use your API key to make your first API call.

```python
import requests
response = requests.post("https://api.venice.ai/api/v1/chat/completions")
```
</Step>
</Steps>

## Authentication

<Warning>
Keep your API key secure!
</Warning>

Use the `Authorization` header with your API key.

<CodeGroup>
```python
headers = {"Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"}
```

```javascript
const headers = { "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" };
```
</CodeGroup>
